text:
TIRUNELVELI

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, V.K. Nursery and Primary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

SANKARANKOVIL

Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation: Grievance day for consumers of Sankarankovil, Office of the Executive Engineer, 11 a.m.

PULIYAMPATTI

St. Antony’s Shrine: Annual feast, sixth day celebrations, Holy Mass, 6 a.m., rosary and Holy Mass 11.30 a.m., Holy Mass by Rev. Fr. S. Alphonse, parish priest, Pettai, homily by Rev. Fr. P. Maria Francis, parish priest, Sankar Nagar, benediction, church premises, 6.30 p.m. onwards.
title: engagements
